channel.title: [PI] How Do You Remove Teleport Options?
channel.description: How do you remove teleport options? Like when you click a teleport in the spellbook and an interface comes up with different places to teleport to.

item.title: [PI] How Do You Remove Teleport Options?
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

adamknightz:

How do you remove teleport options? Like when you click a teleport in the spellbook and an interface comes up with different places to teleport to.

you mean the teleport options? the options on the interface can be found in dialoguehandler.java,

or to remove all the options find out the button id, by clicking on the teleport and checking server to see the button id, then find it in clickingbuttons.java i think

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How Do You Remove Teleport Options?

item.title: [PI] How Do You Remove Teleport Options?
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

lpxd:

clicking buttons. Thats where your problem is. Make sure the id you put is not the hover id, but the physical clicking id.

			case 50235:
			case 4140:
			case 117112:
			if(c.isInJail()) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't Teleport In Jail.");
			return;
			}
			if(c.inWild()) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't Teleport In Wildy, Please Use Teletabs.");
			return;
			}
			c.teleAction = 1;
			break;

Is one example of a teleport code in ClickingButtons.java. I would change the case to something that makes me teleport, right? Or do I got this all wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How Do You Remove Teleport Options?

item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

Well…I found out how to remove the interface and rename the spell. The problem now is that when I click the teleport, nothing happens (it doesn’t work). How do I make it work?

item.description:

runewings317:

In client.java there’s a bunch of words (like texthandler in delta). Search for the name of the teleport and then change it.

I can’t find any names of any teleports in client.java. It’s okay, though…I’ll figure it out later.

item.title: [PI] How Do You Remove Teleport Options?
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

runewings317:

Get the case of the teleport you want to get rid of, search for it in clickingMost.java and delete the place where it said something like “showinterface”.

I don’t have ClickingMost.java.

I have ClickingButtons.java, ClickingStuff.java, and ClickingInGame.java.

Read full topic
